alert.note: Alert for Madison; Northern Oneida; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:20PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN ONEIDA AND CENTRAL MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 520 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Lenox, or near Oneida, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rome, Oneida, Kirkland, Lenox, Verona, Westmoreland, Chittenango, Canastota, Paris, and Floyd. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 32 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central New York.
